function title_billboard () { // í¬©í±Š // let show = [ "í«°í½¢, "í«°í¾¢, "í«°í¿¢ ] // let show = [ "í«±í²¢, "í«±í³¢, "í«±í´¢, "í«±íµ¢, "í«±í¶¢, "í«±í·¢, "í«±í¸¢, "í«±í±¢ ] let show = [ "í«´í¸¢ ] let counter = 0 setInterval (function () { document.title = show [ counter ] counter += 1 if (counter == show.length) { counter = 0 } }, 10000); }
